Company: Club Sport San Ramon/Oakwood Athletic Club
Description of incident: "What Happened and What Information was involved?On July 31, 2017, we discovered that an employee was the subject of a phishing attack when they received an email that appeared to be from an executive, requesting copies of employees W-2 wage and tax statements. In response to that email, individual employee W-2 information was sent to an unauthorized email address. From our investigation, it appears that this contained your personal information, including your name, address, Social Security number, and wage and tax information from 2016. This DID NOT include personal banking or financial account information. Local law enforcement and the IRS have been notified of this incident and we are cooperating with their investigations."
